data.text:
David Burtka is an American actor, best known for his role in the CBS sitcom How I Met Your Mother. For over two decades now, he has established himself as one of America’s most successful and recognizable actors.

His stellar performances have earned him numerous awards and made him a household name. With a net worth of about $3 million, David Burtka has certainly come a long way from where he started out.

But his acting career is just the tip of the iceberg when it comes to this charismatic entertainer. Join us as we explore the fascinating life story of David Burtka – from small-town Ohio to Hollywood stardom!

Discover what makes him so special and read all about his inspirational journey back to success!

Where Is David Burtka From and Where Was David Burtka Born

David Burtka is an American actor, born in Dearborn, Michigan on May 29th 1975. Celebrating his 48th birthday this Sunday, he has experienced a successful career in acting over the past two decades.

Typically identified for his roles as Justin Walker in How I Met Your Mother and Neil Patrick Harris' husband on Glee, David Burtka continues to surprise us with his work. Raised on the outskirts of Detroit in what he calls a "close-knit rural community" of Michigan, he developed a passion for drama early on and set out to pursue it at The Theatre School at DePaul University.

His work since then has resulted in multiple award nominations including an EMMY nod and even being named one of People Magazine's Sexiest Men Alive back in 2011 - not bad for someone who hails from a small town! As we look back over his career to date, one can't help but be inspired by how far David Burtka has come; from humble beginnings in Dearborn to becoming one of the leading faces of television today.

How Old is David Burtka? David Burtka Age and Birthday Info

David Burtka is 47 years old and was born on May 29, 1975 in Dearborn, Michigan, United States. As one of the most acclaimed actors of our generation, David's age has become only a number- he never fails to captivate audiences with his performances on stage and screen.

Long before gracing the small screen in notable shows like "How I Met Your Mother" and "American Horror Story", David had already made a name for himself in theater circles through his memorable turns in iconic plays like "Fools Rush In". His star truly rose when he made his big break into movies, playing roles like Anne Hathaway’s love interest in "The Wedding Date".

Today at 47 years young, David continues to prove that there are no limits to what you can do if you put your mind to it- whatever your age!

What is David Burtka’s Zodiac Sign

David Burtka was born on May 29, 1975, making his zodiac sign Gemini. For actors, the sign of the Twins symbolizes the need for versatility and intelligence.

Geminis are often referred to as "social butterflies" due to their chatty demeanor and friendly disposition. This makes them ideal for playing a wide variety of characters: they can be awkward beginners or polished pros depending on the project at hand!

A natural charmer, David Burtka is well-suited to life as an actor with his ability to connect with people. His Gemini traits suggest he's analytical yet creative when it comes to exploring different sides of himself and bringing new depth to each character he portrays.

He's also curious enough that he never stops learning in order to grow into better roles over time—an invaluable trait for any stage or screen performer. Whether it's comedy or drama, David Burtka has what it takes to capture an audience's attention thanks in part to his zodiac sign giving him just the right amount of versatility on set!

How Did David Burtka Get Famous?

David Burtka is a popular actor, known for his roles in hit television shows such as How I Met Your Mother and A Series of Unfortunate Events. He gained popularity over the years through his acting chops and business acumen, which led to him becoming one of Hollywood's hottest celebrities.

At 47, David has had an enviable career on screen and behind the scenes – with an impressive list of credits that include producing films, directing commercials, and running a production company. His charismatic presence has captivated audiences around the world and he continues to show no signs of slowing down anytime soon!

For Vogue magazine style: David Burtka is Hollywood royalty - beloved by millions for his trademark twinkling eyes, witty humor, and impeccable talent across various mediums. Over two decades in show business have made this charming 47-year-old into one of the most sought after leading men on both film and television screens; you’ve seen him in hit shows like How I Met Your Mother or Netflix’s acclaimed series A Series Of Unfortunate Events.

But Burtka isn't just a talented actor: he's also a savvy businessman who produces films, directs commercials, runs his own production company…the list goes on! And it doesn't hurt that he looks pretty dapper too - if there were ever any doubt about how far class can take you these days go ahead to look at Mr. Burtka for proof!

David Burtka Net Worth and Earnings

David Burtka's net worth is estimated to be $3 million. The 47-year old actor, business owner and television personality has made a name for himself in the entertainment industry as an acclaimed and successful producer.

With investments in multiple productions, his savvy business acumen has earned him an impressive fortune. His resume includes credits on major shows such as "Glee" and "How I Met Your Mother," along with several feature films from which he continues to receive recurring funds.

Known for being bold with his investment choices, David Burtka is a prime example of charisma and ambition meeting success. He consistently makes smart decisions that reap positive returns both financially and in terms of recognition from peers and fans around the world.

Though his shows have been on hiatus due to global pandemics over the past couple years, David does not seem to be slowing down anytime soon--and neither does his bank account! On May 26th 2023, this dynamic entertainer continues to rake in steady revenue streams from all aspects of show biz: producing movies, investing in new projects, starring on television programs, teaching others about money management... No wonder he holds such tremendous wealth!

David Burtka Nationality and Ethnicity

David Burtka is an American actor of White ethnicity. As a multi-talented performer, David's cultural background has certainly played a role in his professional success.

His well-rounded appeal and ability to portray various characters from different backgrounds have been invaluable assets to his career, allowing him to bring depth and authenticity to every performance. He has drawn on his own unique experiences as part of the white diaspora in America – not only from the privilege and societal status that comes with it, but also as a result of being exposed to diverse culture all around him – which can be seen on stage or screen whenever he appears.
